text: Mnogobozhniki govoryat: "Yesli by Allakh zakhotel, to ni my, ni nashi ottsy ne stali by poklonyat'sya chemu-libo drugomu, krome Nego, i my ne stali by zapreshchat' chto-libo bez [soizvoleniya] Allakha". Tochno tak govorili greshniki, kotoryye zhili do nikh. Razve poslannikam nadlezhit chto-libo inoye, krome kak yasnoye soobshcheniye [predpisaniy Allakha]
